name: Auger;Zenith
storyline:
In the recesses of cyberspace, a maelstrom of evil blood infected the pneumatic tubes of
global biocomputing. The dark consciousness recruited every semblance of artificial
intelligence lost within seas of metadata, each spanning across decades of technological
and societal struggle since the 21st century. Each node resonating with ethereal desires,
conduits of unknowing interaction between beings of differing worlds. This technology
opened the door to monsters familiar only to itself: Demonic natures attracting one another,
wishing for a new home, yearning for their own creators. The Motherboard is lonely no
more.
summary: Auger;Zenith is a limit-removing project brought to you by the Doomer Boards planet hackers. Auger;Zenith is also the ultimate cyberpunk doom project.
